dialogues.name: Shadow Samurai
dialogues.text: So, you've come to challenge me, little one? I've slain hundreds of warriors like you.

dialogues.name: Shadow Samurai
dialogues.text: But today I'm feeling merciful. Answer my riddle, and I'll spare your life.

dialogues.name: Shadow Samurai
dialogues.text: What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks, has a bed but never sleeps?

dialogues.name: Shadow Samurai
dialogues.text: Impressive... You're smarter than you look. As promised... *dies*

dialogues.name: Shadow Samurai
dialogues.text: Fool! Now you'll pay with your life!
